item.description:
Chenille has always given a unique look to knitting and has been in demand on and off for the last 50 years. the fibers are all lined up horizontally on a machine, stitched down the center, then trimmed -sort of like a pipe cleaner. This is one reason it has no elasticity and also why it can shed.

This fiber fact and many more to come.

Membership fee of $5 due this month.

Also we have a knit night coming up.
item.name: Knit it Up -Wednesday February 25
